Name: HMS Zinnia
Builder: Smiths Dock Company, South Bank, Middlesbrough
Propulsion:
Two fire tube boilers
one 4-cycle triple-expansion steam engine
Range: 3,500 nautical miles (6,500 km; 4,000 mi) at 12 knots (22 km/h; 14 mph)
Armament:
1 × BL 4 in (102 mm) Mk IX gun,
2 × .50 inch (12.7 mm) twin machine guns,
2 × .303 inch (7.7 mm) Lewis machine guns
2 × stern depth charge racks with 40 depth charges
